reviews.review_msg: When take his course. Remind urself:do u wanna lower ur GPA, if yes then take it. He thinks his lecture was funny, um..... not really. His lecture doesn't help u know how to do questions on midterms and final. Usually his test r really trick. Get familiar with homework r not enough. Any teacher is better than him, for ur GPA trust me.
Tough course. Believe it or not this is a math prof that actually has inflection in his voice and can actually make students interested. The best calculus prof I have encountered so far
